title: The Week of Bob Perry: Counselor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Bob Perry, a 38-year-old counselor, discovers his hidden powers and uses them to resolve tensions in his community while also combating a mysterious threat.
summaryGerman: Bob Perry, ein 38-jähriger Berater, entdeckt seine verborgenen Kräfte und nutzt sie, um Spannungen in seiner Gemeinde zu lösen und gleichzeitig eine mysteriöse Bedrohung zu bekämpfen.
summaryDutch: Bob Perry, een 38-jarige counselor, ontdekt zijn verborgen krachten en gebruikt ze om spanningen in zijn gemeenschap op te lossen en tegelijkertijd een mysterieuze bedreiging te bestrijden.
summaryFrench: Bob Perry, un conseiller de 38 ans, découvre ses pouvoirs cachés et les utilise pour résoudre les tensions dans sa communauté tout en combattant une menace mystérieuse.

story.text: Bob Perry stumbled upon a glowing stone during a morning jog, which inexplicably granted him the power of empathy enhancement, feeling the emotions of others more intensely.
Using his newfound abilities, Bob successfully mediated a major dispute at the local community center, feeling both fulfilled and energized.
Bob's powers started to affect his personal life, causing strain with his family due to the overwhelming emotions, leading to a sad evening of reflection.
An anonymous note led Bob to suspicious activities at the town's edge. His investigation filled the night with an epic sense of purpose.
Bob, feeling energetic, used his counseling session to empower his clients, harnessing his abilities for greater community healing.
During a day of relaxation and hobby coaching, Bob encountered a romantic interest who shared similar passions, adding a new layer to his life.
Bob resolved the threat to his town by revealing the corrupt officials behind the suspicious activities, restoring peace and earning the town’s gratitude.

ending: As the sun set on a grateful community, Bob Perry smiled, knowing his journey had only just begun.
moral: Hidden strengths can be found in the most unexpected places and times.
